sentences.sContent: If the petitioner dies or , if there are more than one petitioner , the last remaining petitioner dies.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the petitioner dies or , if there are more than one petitioner , the last remaining petitioner dies.
sentences.sCn: 如呈请人去世；或如有多于一名呈请人，最后尚存的呈请人去世；

sentences.sContent: We are returning your case to USCIS to make a final determination with regards to your petitioner's ability to file a petition on your behalf.
sentences.sContent_eng: We are returning your case to USCIS to make a final determination with regards to your petitioner's ability to file a petition on your behalf.
sentences.sCn: 你的申请档案正被退回美国移民局以就你的美国申请人能否为你提交移民申请做出最终的决定。

words.tran: 请愿的，为请愿的；请求的
请愿；请愿书；祈求；[法] 诉状

trans.tranOther: someone who writes or signs a petition
